verses.text: 'Arani, Tseti, 'Enuxi,
Kainahani, Marareri, Kareri,
'Enuki, Matutsareni, Rameki,
Nuhexi. Nuhexi nuiwarimama (1Kem 1:5-23 - Tsut 10:2-31, 11:10-27) Nuhexi niwemama: Tsemi, Kami meta Kapeti.
Kapeti niwemama mepitetetewakai: Kumexi, Makuki, Marahi, Kawani, Tuwari, Metseki meta Tiratsi.
Kumexi niwemama: 'Atsikenatsi, Xipati meta Tukaxima.
Kawani niwemama: 'Eritsaha, Taritsi, Tsipire meta Xuranini.
Kami niwemama mepitetewakai: Kutsi, Mitsirahini, Puti meta Kanani.
Kutsi niwemama mepitetewakai: Tsewa, Kawira, Tsaweta, Xahama meta Tsaweteka. Xakama niwemama mekanakine: Tsawaha meta Rerani.
Kutsi Nimiruri paapaya kanayani, miki tewi kwinimieme reuyutamieweti kanayani 'ena kwiepa.
Mitsirahini wa'ukiyari kanayani rureutsixi, 'anameutsixi, rehawitsixi, natuhitsixi,
meta paturutseutsixi, katsurukitsixi meta katuritsixi miki piritsiteutsixi wa'ukiyarima mepaki.
Kanani Tsiruni paapaya kanayani matiarieya, meta Heti,
meta mepixiiyarimamatikai kewutseutsixi,
'amuxeutsixi, keriketseutsixi, heweutsixi, 'aratseutsixi, tsineutsixi,
'axiwareutsixi, tsemareutsixi meta kamatitsixi.
Tsemi niwemama: 'Erami, 'Atsuxi, 'Axipatsari, Ruri meta 'Arami. 'Arami niwemama: 'Utsi, Huri, Ketexi meta Metseki.
'Axipatsari Tseraki kanipaapayatikaitini, mikita 'Ewexi paapaya patia.
Meta 'Ewexi yuhutame yuniwema kaniwarayexeiya: mexiakame Pereki pititewakai, miki 'utinuiwaku teiteri yuxaita memeukuyaxixiaki yayupapaimeti. Pereki mutaya pititewakai Kutani.
Kutani 'Arimurari paapaya patia meta Tserepi, Katsaxi-Maweti, Yeraki,
Harurani, 'Utsari, Rikira
'Uwari, 'Awimaheri, Tsawa,
'Upixi, Kawira meta Kuwawi. 'Iki yunaiti Kutani mekaniniwemamatini.
Tsemi, 'Axipatsari, Tseraki
'Ewexi, Pereki, Xehu,
Tseruki, Nakuxi, Teraki
meta 'Apirami, 'Apirahami mititewatatsiere.
'Apirahami niwemama: 'Itsahaki meta 'Itsimaheri.
'Itsimaheri niwemama: Newayuti mexiakameya patia, Tseraxi, 'Ariweheri, Miwitsani,
Mitsima, Rumaha, Matsa, Haraha, Temaha,
Ketuxi, Napitsi meta Tserema. Miki mepihiki 'Itsimaheri niwemama.
'Apirahami niwemama Tsetura muwarayexei 'iparewiwameya 'iyaddWidget
Mariyani niwemama: 'Epa, 'Epexi, Kanuki, 'Awiraha meta 'Eriraha. Yunaiti miki Tsetura niwemama mepihiki.
'Apirahami meta 'Itsahaki paapaya kanayani. 'Itsahaki niwemama mekanakine 'Etsahu meta 'Ixaheri.
'Etsahu niwemama: 'Eripaxi, Xehueri, Kehutsi, Karani meta Kure.
'Eripaxi niwemama: Temani, 'Umaxi, Tsepuhu, Katani meta Kenatsi, Timina meta 'Amareki.
Xehueri niwemama: Nakati, Tsera, Tsama meta Mitsaha.
Tsehixi niwemama: Rutani, Tsuwari, Tsiwehuni, 'Ahana, Ritsuni, 'Etsexi meta Ritsani.
Rutani niwemama: Huri meta Humani. Rutani Timina pitaruyatikai.
Tsuwari niwemama: 'Ariwani, Manakati, 'Ewari, Tsepuhu meta 'Unami. Tsiwehuni niwemama: 'Ayaha meta 'Ahana.
'Ahana nu'aya kanayani Ritsuni. Ritsuni niwemama: 'Amirani, 'Etsiwani, 'Itirani meta Kerani.
'Etsexi niwemama: Wirani, Tsawani meta Yakani. Ritsani niwemama: 'Utsi meta 'Arahani.
Te'aitamete 'ena memika'uxa kwieyaritsie 'Erumi mekateniuta'aita, 'ixaheritsixi ti'aitame mekahexeiyakaku: 'akuxi Wera Wehuxi nu'aya, kiekarieya Rinawa katinitewakaitini.
Kepauka mumi Wera, 'utimanata katiniuta'aita Kuwawi Tsera nu'aya, Wutsira kiekametiti.
Kepauka Kuwawi mumi, 'utimana katiniuta'aita Kutsani, miki Temani kwieyaritsie pikiekametikai.
Kepauka Kutsani mumi, 'utimana katiniuta'aita Harari Werari nu'aya, miki mariyanitsixi kaniwara'iwa Muhawi kwieyaritsie. Kiekarieya katinitewakaitini 'Awiti.
Kepauka Harari mumi, 'utimana katiniuta'aita Tsamira, Matsireka kiekame.
Kepauka Tsamira mumi, 'utimana katiniuta'aita Tsahuri, Xekuwuti mirakutewatsie kiekame 'Eupirate hatuxameyari tetsita.
Kepauka Tsahuri mumi, 'utimana katiniuta'aita Wahari-Kanani 'Akuwuxi nu'aya.
Kepauka Wahari-Kanani mumi, 'utimana katiniuta'aita Harari. Kiekarieya katinitewakaitini Pahu, 'iyaya Mehitaweri pititewakai, Matereri nu'aya meta Metsawi teukarieya.
Kepaukata Harari mumi, 'Erumi kwieyaritsie mekateniuta'aita 'iki 'itsikate: Timina, 'Ariwa, Keteti,
'Ahuriwama, 'Eraha, Pinuni,
Kenatsi, Temani, Miwitsaxi,
Makirieri meta 'Irami. mekanakine 'Erumi kwieyaritsie.
'Ixaheri niwemama mekanihikitini: Xuweni, Tsimehuni, Rewi, Kura, 'Itsakaxi, Tsawuruni,
Rani, Kutse, Wenikamini, Nepitahari, Kahari meta 'Atsexi.

Kura niwemama: 'Exi, 'Unani meta Tseraxi. 'Iki meyuhaikame 'uka kananeu tewiyari Tsuhaki niweya hetsie puwarayexei. 'Exi Kura pimatiarieyatikai, miki Yawé kemikatinake pitiuyuri, hiki Yawé tukarieya pinawairi.
Tamaxi, Kura mu'eya, tiri yuhutame kaniwarayexeiya Kura hetsiemieme: Paretsi meta Tsera. Hiki meyunaiti Kura meyu'auxiwime kaniwarayexeiya tiri.
Paretsi niwemama: Ketsiruni meta Kamuri.
Tsera niwemama meyunaiti meyu'auxiwiti mepaki: Tsimiri, 'Etani, Hemani, Karikuri meta Raxira.
Karimi nu'aya 'Akaxi* kanayani, tatsiari miki 'axamitiuyuri 'Ixaheri hetsiemieme Kakaiyari 'aitsikaya mika'anu'eni naime kememiteka'unakekai.
'Etani nu'aya 'Atsariyaxi kanayani.
Ketsiruni niwemama: Kerameri, Xami meta Keruwahi.
Xami 'Aminarawi paapaya kanayani, mikita Nahatsuni paapaya kanayani, Kura nuiwarimama wa'ukiyari matia.
Nahatsuni Tsarimuni pupaapayatikai, mikita Puhuxi paapaya patia.
Puhuxi 'Uweri paapaya patia, mikita 'Itsahi paapaya patia.
Kitsahi nu'aya mexiakame patia 'Eriyáwi, hutarieka mieme 'Awinarawi, hairieka mieme Tsimaha,
naurieka mieme Natanaheri, 'auxiwirieka mieme Xarahi,
'ataxewirieka mieme 'Utseni, 'atahutarieka mieme Rawiri.
Wa'iwama 'ukari mekatenitetewakaitini Tsariwiya meta 'Awikahiri. Tsariwiya niwemama meyuhaikati mekanakine: 'Awitsahi, Kuhawi meta 'Atsaheri.
'Awikahiri 'Amatsaha mamaaya kanayani Ketexi matia memeyexei 'itsimaheri tewiyari.
Karewi Ketsiruni nu'aya türi kaniwarayexeiya yu'iitama 'Atsuwa meta Kerihuti wahamatia. 'Iki niwemama mekanakine: Ketsexi, Tsuwawi meta 'Axiruni.
Kepauka 'Atsuwa mumi, Karewi 'Epirata kaniutiwitini, miki matiata yuniwe Kuxi kanayexeiya.
Kuxi 'Urihi paapaya kanayani, mikita Wetsareri paapaya kanayani.
Kepauka Ketsiruni haika tewiyari wiyari mexeiyakai, Makixi nu'aya kaniutiwitini, Karaha paapaya, miki matia kaneyexeiya yuniwe Tsekuwi.
Tsekuwi Yahixi paapaya kanayani, miki xeitewiyari heimana haika kiekariyari katinipinieyatikaitini Karaha kwieyaritsie.

Peru Ketsuxi meta 'Arami mekaninawairieni Yahixi kiekariteya meta Kenati kiekariteya, metatsiere kiekarite wa'aurie mamanetikatei. Naiti munawaiyarie kanayani haika tewiyari kiekarite. Miki meyunaiti Makixi nuiwarimama mepihikitikai, Karaha paapaya.
'Arike Ketsiruni 'umiku Karewi-'Epirata mirakutewatsie, 'iyaya 'Awiyaxi, 'Atsuxi kanayexeiya, mikita Tekuha paapaya kanayani.
Kerameri niwemama, Ketsiruni matiarieya, mekanakine: matiarieya Xami, Wuna, 'Ureni, 'Utseni meta 'Ahiyaxi.
Kerameri tawari xeime kaniutiwitini, miki katinitewakaitini 'Atara. Miki 'Unami mamaaya kanayani.
Xami niwemama, Kerameri matiarieya, mekanakine: Mahatsi, Kamini meta 'Ekexi.
'Unami niwemama: Tsamahi meta Yara. Tsamahi niwemama: Narawi meta 'Awitsuxi.
'Awitsuxi 'iyaya katinitewakaitini 'Awikahiri, miki hamatia 'Akiwani kanayexeiya meta Muriri.
Narawi niwemama: Tsereri meta 'Apahini. Tsereri kaniumini türi kawarayexeiyaweti.
'Apahini nu'aya 'Itsi kanayani, 'Itsi nu'aya Tsetsani kanihikitikaitini, Tsetsani nu'aya 'Akirahi kanayani.
Yara niwemama, Tsamahi 'iwaya, mekanihikitini: Ketexi meta Kunatani. Ketexi kaniumini tiri kawarayexeiyaweti.
Kunatani niwemama: Pereti meta Tsatsa. 'Iki mekanakine Kerameri nuiwarimama.
Tsetsani 'ukitsi pikawarayexei 'ukari puwarayexei pita, meta xeime 'uki wairiyarika ti'uximayatame pexeiyakai 'ekipitutanaka Yaxika titewakame.
Miki xeime yuniwe kaniwititiani, miki 'Atahi mamaaya kanayani.
'Atahi Natani paapaya kanayani, Natani Tsawari paapaya patia,
Tsawari 'Epirari pupaapayatikai, 'Epirari 'Uweri pupaapayatikai,
'Uweri Kehu pupaapayatikai, Kehu 'Atsariyaxi pupaapayatikai,
'Atsariyaxi Heretsi pupaapayatikai, Heretsi 'Eratsa pupaapayatikai,
'Eratsa Tsitsimahi pupaapayatikai, Tsitsimahi Tsaruni pupaapayatikai,
Tsaruni Kekamiyaxi pupaapayatikai, meta Kekamiyaxi 'Eritsama pupaapayatikai.
Karewi niwemama, Kerameri 'iwaya, mekanakine: matiarimieme Metsaha, miki Tsipi paapaya matia, meta Maretsa, Hewuruni paapaya matia.
Hewuruni niwemama: Kure, Tapuhaki, Xekeni metatsiere Tsema.
Tsema Xahami 'ukiyarieya patia, mikita Kuxukuhani paapaya patia. Xekeni Tsamahi paapaya patia.
Tsamahi Mahuni paapaya patia.
Mahuni Wetsuxi paapaya patia. 'Epa, Karewi ti'uximayatsiriwame 'iy데일리titi matia, Karani mamaaya kanayani meta Mutsa, Katsetsi meta. Karani Katsetsi paapaya patia.
Yarahi niwemama: Xekeni, Kutani, Ketsani, Pereti, 'Epa meta Tsakapi.
Mahaka, Karewi ti'uximayatsiriwame 'iyดี๋ยวiti matia, Tsewexi mamaaya kanayani meta Tirikana,
metatsiere Tsakapi mamaaya kanayani, Marimana paapaya matia, metatsiere Maka Tsewa mamaaya patia, miki Makiwena paapaya matia meta Kiweya. Metatsiere Karewi xeime 'uka kanayexeiya 'Akatsa titewakame.
Miki mekanakine Karewi nuiwarimama. Kuxi niwemama, 'Epirata matiarieya, mekanakine: Tsuwari, Kiriati-Yeharini paapaya matia,
Tsarima, Wereni paapaya, meta Karepi, Weti-Karexi paapaya matia.
Tsuwari niwemama, Kiriati-Yeharini paapaya, mekanakine: Haruhe, hixiata me'ati manakatitsixi,
Kiriati-Yeharini türiyamama, 'itiritatsixi, putitsixi, tsumatitsixi meta mitsirahitsixi, miki wahetsie mepiyeki tsuratitsixi meta 'etsitahuritsixi.
Tsarima niwemama: Wereni, netupatari, 'Ateruti-Weti-Kuhawi, hixiata me'ati manakatitsixi, tsurehitsixi,
metatsiere te'utiwamete Kawetsi memitamakai, miki mepihikitikai, tirateutsixi, tsimateutsixi meta tsukatehutsixi. 'Iki mepaki kenitsixi, Kamati nuiwarimama, tiriyamama wapaapa.
'Iki mepihiki Rawiri niwemama memutinunui- waxi Hewuruni kiekariyaritsie: 'Aminuni matiarieya kanayani 'Akinuhani hetsiemieme Ketsireri kiekame, hutarieka mieme,
Tanieri 'Awikahiri hetsiemieme Kaximeri kiekame, hairieka mieme, 'Awitsaruni Mahaka hetsiemieme, ti'aitame Tarimahi nu'aya Ketsuxi miti'aitametikai,
naurieka mieme, 'Aruniyaxi hetsiemieme, Kakiti 'auxiwirieka mieme, Tsepatiyaxi 'Awitari hetsiemieme, 'ataxewirieka mieme, 'Itirehani hetsiemieme, 'Ekira mikitatsiere Rawiri mi'iyayatikai.

Mɨkɨ meyu'ataxewitɨ mekaniutinunuiwa Hewuruni, kepauka mana mɨti'aitakai 'atahuta wiyari heimana 'ataxewime metseri. Kerutsareme kiekariyaritsieta katiniuta'aita xeitewiyari heimana tamamata heimana haika wiyari.
Manata mekaniutinunuiwa Tsimaha, Tsuwawi, Natani meta Tsarumuni, mɨkɨ Wetitsawe hetsie mepɨmiemetetɨkai, 'Amiheri nu'aya.
Metatsiere puwarayexei 'Iwikaxi, 'Eritsama, 'Eripereti,
Nuka, Nepeki, Kapiha,
'Eritsama, 'Erihara meta 'Eripereti, yunaitɨ mepuyu'atanauka.
Yunaitɨ mɨkɨ Rawiri mepɨniwemama, meka'inɨaritɨ te'uximayatamete 'ɨitamamatɨtɨ memakɨ wahetsie mɨwarayexei. Wa'iwa 'uka pɨtitewakai Tamaxi.
'Ikɨ mepɨhɨkɨ Tsarumuni nuiwarimama te'aitamete memakɨ: Xuwuhani, 'Awiyaxi, 'Atsá, Kutsapati,
Kurani, 'Ukutsiyaxi, Kuhatsi,
'Amatsiyaxi, 'Atsariyaxi, Kutani,
'Akatsi, 'Etsekiyaxi, Manatsexi,
'Amuni meta Kutsiyaxi.
Kutsiyaxi niwemama mekanakɨne: Mexɨakame Kuhanahani, hutarieka mieme Kuhatsimi, hairieka mieme Tserekiyaxi, naurieka mieme Tsaruni.
Kuhatsimi niwemama mekanakɨne Keku niyaxi meta Tserekiyaxi:
Kekuniyaxi niwemama, muwiyarie tewa mehanie, mekanakɨne: Tsaratiheri,
Marikirani, Perahiyaxi, Tsenatsaxi, Kekamiyaxi, Hutsama meta Nerawiyaxi.
Perahiyaxi niwemama mekanakɨne: Tsuruwaweri meta Tsimi. Tsuruwaweri niwemama mekanakɨne: Metsurani meta Kananiyaxi, wa'iwa 'uka Tserumiti pɨtitewakai.
Meta 'ikɨ kaniwarayexeiya meyu'auxɨwime: Katsuwa, 'Uheri, Werekiyaxi, Katsariyaxi meta Yutsawi-Ketseri.
Kananiyaxi nuiwarimama mekanakɨne: Peratiyaxi meta Kitsariyaxi, metatsiere Xepahiyaxi niwemama nuiwarimama mepakɨ, meta 'Axinahani niwemama, meta 'Awiriyaxi niwemama metatsiere Tsekaniyaxi niwemama.
Tsekaniyaxi nuiwarimama mepakɨ Tsemahiyaxi meta niwemama: Katuxi, 'Ikahari, Wariyaxi, Nehariyaxi meta Tsapati, mɨkɨ yunaitɨ mepuyu'ataxewi.
Nehariyaxi niwemama mepakɨ: 'Eri huhenahi, 'Etsekiyaxi meta 'Atsirikani, mɨkɨ yunaitɨ mepuyuhaika.
'Erihuhenahi niwemama mepakɨ: Hurawiyaxi, 'Eriyatsiwi, Perahiyaxi, 'Akuwi, Kuhanahani, Rerahiyaxi meta 'Ananihi, mɨkɨ meyunaitɨ mepɨ'atahuta.
Kura nuiwarimama mekanihɨkɨtɨni: Paretsi, Ketsiruni, Karimi, Kuxi meta Tsuwari.
Xehahiyaxi Tsuwari nu'aya Yakati paapaya kanayani, meta Yakati 'Akumahi paapaya kanayani meta Rakari. Mɨkɨ mekanakɨne tsuratitsixi nuiwariyari.
'Etami niwemama menakɨne: Ketsireri, 'Itsima meta 'Iwatsi. Wa'iwa 'uka katinite wakaitɨni Katsereripuni.
Metatsiere niwemama mekanakɨne: Penuheri, Keruxi paapaya, meta 'Etsexi, Kutsa paapaya. Mɨkɨ mekanakɨne Kuxi nuiwarimama, 'Epɨrata matɨarieya, Wereni paapaya.
'Atsuxi, Tekuha paapaya yuhutame 'ukarawetsixi kaniwarutiwitɨni, Hera meta Nahara.
Nahara 'Akutsani mamaaya patɨa meta Hepexi, Temeni meta 'Akatsitari. Mɨkɨ Nahara niwemama mekanakɨne.
Hera niwemama mekanakɨne: Tsereti, Yetsukaxi meta 'Etinahani.
Kuhutsi 'Anuwi 'ukiyarieya patɨa, meta Tsuwewa, metatsiere 'Akaxikeri tɨɨriyamama Haruni nu'aya.
Kawetsi waɨkawa rexeiyatɨ patɨa 'iwamama kememɨka'anekai. Kepauka mamaaya mɨyamɨtiterɨwaxɨ, mɨpaɨ kaniutayɨni: «Netiuka'eniwatɨ nepitiniwexɨ».

Hikɨ Kawetsi 'Ixaheri Kakaɨyarieya mɨpaɨ pɨtiutawawiri: «'Aixɨa keneneyurieka, kwie 'eyeume keneneyetuiri, kenene parewieka, 'axamɨ'anetsie keneneuxɨna nemɨkatiuka'eniwanikɨ». Kakaɨyari yakatini uyurieni kemɨtitawawiri.
Keruwi, Tsuka 'iwaya, Mekixi paapaya kanayani, mɨkɨta Mekixi 'Etsituni paapaya kanayani.
'Etsituni Weti-Xapaha paapaya kanayani meta Patsehaki metatsiere Tekina, 'Ixi-Nakatsi paapaya matɨa. Mɨkɨ mekanakɨne Xekaha kiekatariti.
Kenatsi niwemama mekanakɨne: 'Utunieri meta Tserahiyaxi. 'Utunieri niwemama mekanakɨne: Katati
meta Mehunutahi, mɨkɨ 'Upɨra paapaya matɨa. Tserahiyaxi Kuhawi paapaya patɨa, mɨkɨta Ke-Karitsini kiekatariti wapaapa patɨa, mana kiekatari tepɨakɨ te'uximayatamete memɨhɨkɨtɨkaikɨ.
Karewi niwemama Kepune nu'aya mekanakɨne: 'Ixi, 'Eraha meta Nuhani. 'Eraha Kenatsi paapaya kanayani.
Yarereri niwemama mekanakɨne: Tsipi, Tsipa, Tiriyaxi meta 'Atsareri.
'Etsitɨraxi niwemama mekanakɨne: Ketexi, Mereri, 'Epexi meta Karuni.

Xewitɨ Mereri 'ɨyaya ―hetsiena kaniwarayexeiya: Miriyami, Tsamahi meta 'Itsiwa, 'Etsitemuha paapaya matɨa― mɨkɨ Witiha katinitewakaitɨni Parahuni nu'aya. Xewitɨta Mereri 'ɨyaya Kura nuiwarieyatsie kanimiemetɨkaitɨni, mɨkɨ hamatɨa kaniwarayexeiya: Kereri, Keruxi paapaya, Hewexi, Tsuku paapaya, meta Kekutiheri, Tsanuha paapaya.
Kehira, Karimi tewiyari, meta 'Etsitemuha, Mahaka kiekame, mɨkɨ Huriyaxi 'ɨyaya niwemama mekanakɨne, tatsɨari, Nakani 'iwaya 'uka.
Tsimuni niwemama mekanakɨne: 'Aminuni, Xina, Weni-Kanani meta Tiruni. 'Itsi niwemama mekanakɨne: Tsuketi meta Weni-Tsuketi.
Tseraxi nuiwarimama Kura nu'aya mekanakɨne: 'Exi, Rekaha paapaya, Raraha, Maretsa paapaya, meta memɨte'uximaya rinutsie Weti-'Atsiweya kiekariyaritsie mepɨtɨɨriyamama,

metatsiere Tsera nuiwarimama mepakɨ Kuhakini, meta Kutsewa kiekariyaritsie kiekatari, Kuhatsi kiekariyaritsie kiekatari meta Tsarape kiekariyaritsie kiekatari, mɨkɨ (mɨpaɨ paine 'utɨarika meripai mieme) kename meka'akunuaxɨawawetɨ Werenitsie 'ukarawetsixi muhawitsixi mewarutiwitɨ.
Mɨkɨ mekanihɨkɨtɨkaitɨni 'iwewamete Netahini memɨkiekataritɨkai meta Kerera, mana mekaniyuhayewa ti'aitame mete'uximayatsirietɨ. Tsimehuni nuiwarimama (1Kem 4:28-33 – Kuts 19:2
